title: Fracture of the cervical spine: crutchfield tongs reduction
brief_description: A silent film with intertitles showing the way crutchfield tongs reduction works to cure a patient who has fractured his cervical spine after diving into shallow water. The initial operation in which the head is drilled is shown performed on a cadaver.
title_for_label: Fracture of the cervical spine: crutchfield tongs reduction
